features: ELEGANT DESIGN: The kitchen utensil holder is made of a wooden base combined with beautiful round ceramics, which is not only a practical storage tool. It is also a visually appealing kitchen decoration.

360° ROTATING: The wooden base features a smooth swivel, allowing you to easily access utensils and tools without having to go back and forth to find what you need. Makes you more efficient when cooking and dining.
DEEP AND LARGE: 7.6" H x 6.1" W, can hold up to 20 cookware, it can maximize your kitchen space while providing you with more storage options.

DURABLE MATERIAL: The utensil crocks is made of natural wood and ceramic to ensure its durability and reliability. This means that it can withstand the rigors of daily use, will not be easily damaged or worn out, and will maintain its fine appearance and functionality over time.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL USE: the cooking utensil organizer not only holds cookware, but also can be used as a vase, ice bucket, and easily placed in a variety of interior spaces including countertops, dining tables, and cabinets, A delightful decorative piece.
body.description: Superior Kitchen Utensil Racks, Enhance the functionality and aesthetics of your kitchen Creative and versatile High-quality kitchen tools and supplies can improve your cooking skills and make delicious flavors easier to achieve. 360° rotating base provides easy access to the cookware and utensils you need for a smooth cooking process. High-quality ceramic body adds exquisite beauty and durability to your kitchen. Multi-functional storage, not only can accommodate a variety of kitchenware, but also can be used for decorating flowers and arranging coffee capsules and other food.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is wonderful. The rotation is smooth. Heavy ceramic utensil holder. Looks great in any kitchen. Not too fancy, not too simple. I love the way you can take holder off the base to clean it, just makes it easier to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large and nice
reviews.reviewText: It is very easy to clean since it is made of ceramic finish which also looks very elegant. It’s is largely spacious. It’s easily spins without jamming on anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice utensil holder to big for my utensils. It’s big enough to use as an flower pot

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A lot thicker than I thought and absolutely gorgeous
reviews.reviewText: This was a lot more study than I thought it'd be. Feels more like a porcelain plant pot. It's super cute and looks amazing in my kitchen. I love the classy look and it holds my utensils well. If this is your esthetic then I definitely recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but the wood bottom isn’t sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This is a cute utensil holder, I like that it spins. The wood bottom that sounds isn’t the best quality. The first one that arrived it was broken and this one has a small split in it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We love this! Rotating feature is great! Large enough to fit many utensils

reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The utensil holder is so beautiful. It looks great and can be rotated.Therefore, it's a very useful storage tool in the kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Large capacity kitchen utensil holder that spins
reviews.reviewText: Overall this is a good utensil holder, but there are a few things that keep it from being great. The ceramic holder is sturdy and the base looks to be bamboo so a nice sustainable wood. The holder is huge and high, so there shouldn't be a problem storing lots of utensils. There are two issues that I have with this item. The first is the base slides on the countertop when I turn it. Yes, felt or rubber feet will prevent this, but would be nice to come with. Also, the holder is noticeably smaller than the base so it slides a bit when you turn it. The base does not turn very freely, either. Overall it's nice, but could be a little better made.
